eelanga paramparawan bohowita deshapalanika danumen pohosathwu piris dhanawadayata ha stalinwadayata erehiwa aragala kirimata piwiseddi owun pariharanaya kaleda awashya aabhashaya ha karunu pahadili kara ganim aadiya laba gaththeda trotsakige kruthin parishilanaya kirimeni. 1989 pasu sowiyat deshaya bindawatima siduwu mathawadi pa්rathiwiplawa samaya thulada trotskige adahas thawamath aakarshaniya bawa oppu wiya. 1930n samaga siduwa athi ithama darunu dhanawadi aarthika arbudaya hamuwe ehi pa්rathipalayak lesa wada karana janathawa menma dilidu janathawa atharin aniwaryayenma janatha karaullak athi wuwahoth e් sandaha trotskige adahas ketharam durata balapanu adda yanna gana dhanawadi nyayawadihu biya pala karathi.
